entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
